org.melior.service.work

Class WorkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.component.core.ServiceComponent
      • org.melior.service.work.WorkManager

  • @Component
public class WorkManager
extends ServiceComponent
    Implementation of a work manager that tracks and manages the processing of calls that come into the service. It logs the lifecycle of incoming calls and also periodically refocuses the CPU usage and memory usage lenses.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Melior
    See Also:
    ServiceComponent, MemoryLens, CPULens
